name: Receipt, Please [Desktop]
description:
Welcome to Receipt, Please. Work at an IKEA customer service help desk but make sure not to make too many mistakes. This game was made in a 4 day game jam.

Game Inspiration

Papers, Please by Lucas Pope

Unity for platform

Team

Mia Wong - Artist

Aaron Wang - Developer

Max Wong - Developer

Sound Credits

Shopping mall noise by soundEffectsFactory on Youtube

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3iZ0WCOJFVQ

Clicking sound by soundBible

http://soundbible.com/tags-button.html

Alarm clock noise by Zapsplat

https://www.zapsplat.com/music/digital-alarm-clock-beeping-4/

Paper crumpling sounds by GamingSoundEffects on Youtube

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=10s1Vz1NjBM

Phone vibration noise by Picture to Sound on Youtube

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fAJqJUaAe9U

Footstep sounds by Music & Sound Library on Youtube

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9g7uukgq0Fc

Japanese school chimes by Uncle Silver Gaming on Youtube

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wjno0ndyZRo

Papers Please for sound song and speech effect

TwistedWave for audio editing
